ENSEMBL function

Source: R/ENSEMBLE.R
SCDC_ENSEMBLE.Rd

ENSEMBL function for deconvolution results output from SCDC_prop

SCDC_ENSEMBLE(bulk.eset, sc.eset.list, ct.varname, sample, ct.sub,
  search.method = c("Grid search", "LAD", "NNLS"),
  search.length = 0.05, iter.max = 2000, nu = 1e-04,
  epsilon = 0.001, truep = NULL, weight.basis = T, ...)

Arguments

bulk.eset

ExpressionSet object for bulk samples
sc.eset.list

list of ExpressionSet objects for single cell reference datasets
ct.varname

variable name for 'cell types'
sample

variable name for subject/samples
ct.sub

a subset of cell types that are selected to construct basis matrix
search.method

method to derive the ENSEMBL weights, including "Grid search", "LAD", "NNLS".
search.length

if using "Grid search", the step length used.
iter.max

the maximum number of iteration in WNNLS
nu

a small constant to facilitate the calculation of variance
epsilon

a small constant number used for convergence criteria
truep

true cell-type proportions for bulk samples if known

Contents

  • Arguments
